Title: Requires ATM machines to release ATM cards with EVM chips prior to disbursing cash or a receipt
Summary: Requires ATM machines to release ATM cards with EVM chips prior to disbursing cash or a receipt; defines EVM chip and related terms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to requiring ATM machines to release ATM cards with EVM chips prior to disbursing cash or a receipt
